c3py.axes¶

class c3py.axes.Axes¶

Manipulate the chart’s axes.

add_secondary_y()¶

Add a secondary y axis to the chart.

Returns:None

class c3py.axes.XAxis¶

Bases: c3py.axes.Axis

Manipulate the chart’s x axis.

set_height(height)¶

Set the height of the x axis, in pixels.

Parameters:height (int) – The desired height of the x axis, in pixels.
Returns:None
set_type(axis_type)¶

Set the type of the x axis.

Parameters:axis_type (str; [‘indexed’ | ‘category’| ‘timeseries’]) – The type of the x axis.
Returns:None
